entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cache Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.3°C

Humidity: 86 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with freezing rain beginning near noon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with freezing rain ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 3 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
